# Problem 1
<div class ="problem">
Starting with the “Module 8 MB7.3 Spreadsheet”, from Chapter 7 in Allman, describe the
liability side structure where you assume the post-default trigger month is zero.
When does the senior tranche pay-off? Does the junior tranche get fully paid?
</div>

The structural inputs for this model include asse-Based Fees of 2%, a 1% reserve account, a default trigger of 5%, an active swap based off the 1-month Libor. The last payment for the senior tranch is made in month 225. The junior tranche does managed to get fully paid by month 360.
